He applied for

下一题

He applied for Teaching Assistantship to finance his education and was_______ the position for his rich experience in teaching. 

选项：

查看正确答案

正确答案：B

应注意不同单词的正确搭配和意思。qualify for sth．和supply sb. with sth./supply sth. for sb．分别为A和D两个选项的正确搭配。B和c两个选项的区别在于grant的意思为“正式给予”，而present的意思为“拿给”。
